sentences.en: 'You deceive yourself, monsieur,'returned the keeper of the wine - shop.
sentences.cn: “ 你认错人了, 先生, ” 酒店老板回答.

sentences.en: Alcoholics are notorious for their ability to deceive themselves about the extent of their problem.
sentences.cn: 酗酒者善于在自身问题的严重性上自欺欺人，这是人所共知的。

sentences.en: At the same time, everything was done to guide our airmen and deceive the foe.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 又作出一切努力,来引导我们的飞行员和迷惑敌人.

sentences.en: Do my eyes deceive me, or is that really an elephant pulling a carriage?
sentences.cn: 我是眼花了 吗 ?还是真有只大象在拉车?

sentences.en: He had been deceived by a young man claiming to be the son of a millionaire.
sentences.cn: 他被一个自称是百万富翁之子的年轻人骗了。

sentences.en: If you can make the last 10 seconds exciting, you can deceive your audience into thinking it's been like that all along.
sentences.cn: 如果能让最后10秒钟紧张刺激，就可以给观众造成场面一直都是如此的假象。

sentences.en: Instinct told him that phony friendliness would not deceive this girl.
sentences.cn: 直觉告诉他,佯装友好骗不了这女孩儿.

sentences.en: Let it deceive them, then , a little longer; it cannot deceive them too much.'
sentences.cn: 就让他们再受受骗好了, 这种人怎么骗他都不算过分. ”

sentences.en: No imposter could deceive him; someone had put him up to all their tricks.
sentences.cn: 任何骗子也骗不了他, 有人已经把他们的一切圈套告诉了他.

sentences.en: Seldon, as he ran, bounded from side to side to baffle and deceive their aim.
sentences.cn: 塞尔登一会儿跳到这边,一会儿跳到那边跑着, 搞乱和干扰他们的目标.

sentences.en: You big simpleton, how can anyone deceive the eye.
sentences.cn: 你这个大傻瓜, 谁能够骗眼睛呢?

sentences.en: You can't pass the examination without working hard, so don't deceive yourself.
sentences.cn: 你不用功就不能及格, 所以不要自欺.

trans.tran_en: to make someone believe something that is not true
to make someone believe something that is not true

trans.tran_cn: 欺骗， 蒙蔽， 行骗
trans.tran_en: to make someone believe something that is not true
